TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PropertyEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Acts as the base class for all property entry classes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry> is the base class for all property entry classes; you cannot create an instance of this class. It defines fields that are used in the derived classes <xref:System.Web.UI.BoundPropertyEntry>, <xref:System.Web.UI.BuilderPropertyEntry>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ComplexPropertyEntry>, <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplatePropertyEntry>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.SimplePropertyEntry>.
The page parser uses property entry classes during parsing to represent expressions found within server control tags.
